message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $138?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay up to $135 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
